subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: It has been a quarter century since the last rematch in a Stanley Cup final, and all the parallels are there as the Red Wings and Penguins prepare to meet in Detroit Saturday night.
snippet: It has been a quarter century since the last rematch in a Stanley Cup final, and all the parallels are there as the Red Wings and Penguins prepare to meet in Detroit Saturday night.
